name: Infinite Pinball
summary:
Infinite Pinball is a classic pinball game with a new endless twist: as high as you can go, embark on the fast-paced hunt for high-score.

This arcade pinball is very challenging, literally a reflex test and almost impossible at some point. You’ll have to have some good practice at the game before challenging your friends and family for a high score!

It’s a perfect game for you if you love arcade, challenging, hard ball or pinball games!

No invasive Ads or In-App purchases. You get the full game for an unbeatable price: FREE!
